For example, users who are interested in using an English locale, + * but want the first day of the week that corresponds with the ISO-8601 + * standard can call + * {@snippet lang=java : + * Locale enIsoLoc = Locale.forLanguageTag("en-u-fw-mon"); + * WeekFields.of(enIsoLoc).getFirstDayOfWeek(); // returns MONDAY + * } + *
